<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>testscript</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var count = new GlideAggregate('x_393636_erf_reimbursement_table');
count.addAggregate('COUNT');
count.query();
var reimburse = 0;
if (count.next()) {
   reimburse = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
}
//Number of incidents varies depending on the current state
//of the incident table
gs.info('Number of incidents: ' + reimburse);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-07 13:48:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>3d1705f0db73330019d2656b4b9619e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>testscript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ERF" source="x_393636_erf">40c76307db23330019d2656b4b961913</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ERF">40c76307db23330019d2656b4b961913</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3d1705f0db73330019d2656b4b9619e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-07 13:48:59</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
